Having seen the opportunities and potential posed within an emerging industry, they decided to focus exclusively on strata management with the formation of John Dethridge Strata Services in 2004.[/mk_fancy_title][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section][vc_column][mk_padding_divider][mk_fancy_title color=”#cfd628″ size=”24″ 0px !important;}”]John and Julie Dethridge are the founders of the business and continue to play an active role in the administration of the company.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][mk_employees column=”2″ description=”false” name_color=”#524a48″ position_color=”#cfd628″ social_color=”#cfd628″ categories=”director”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_divider src=”https://jdstrata.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/sca-member.png” image_size=”full” link=”http://wa.strata.community/” target=”_blank”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”3/4″][mk_blockquote style=”line-style” font_family=”Fjalla+One” font_type=”google”]Industry Best Practice

We are members of the Strata Community Association (WA), the peak industry body for Body Corporate and Community Title Management in Australia and New Zealand. We respect and abide their Code of Conduct, acknowledging that industry professionalism enhances confidence and serves to fulfil the expectations of the public. SCA (WA) provide us with valuable training and information, which produces indirect flow-on benefits to our clients.[/mk_blockquote][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][mk_padding_divider][/vc_column][/mk_page_section][mk_page_section
